categories.name: Television
categories.description: Television advertising is a form of advertising where commercials are aired on television networks or stations.

categories.name: Radio
categories.description: Radio advertising is a form of advertising where commercials are aired on radio stations.

categories.name: Periodicals
categories.description: Periodicals are publications released at regular intervals, such as newspapers, magazines, and journals. Advertising in periodicals refers to ads placed in these publications.

categories.name: Out of Home
categories.description: Out-of-home advertising is advertising that reaches the consumers while they are outside their homes, such as billboards or transit ads.

categories.name: Yellow Pages
categories.description: Yellow Pages advertising refers to ads placed in the Yellow Pages, a telephone directory of businesses.

categories.name: Direct Mail
categories.description: Direct mail is a form of advertising where marketers send printed marketing materials to the homes of consumers.

categories.name: Internet
categories.description: Internet advertising is a form of advertising that is delivered through websites, email, and social media.

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.description: Advertising that does not fit into any of the other categories, or the category is unknown.
